Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Hairdresser \Hair"dress`er\ (-dr[e^]s`[~e]r), n. One who dresses or cuts hair; a barber. [1913 Webster]
hairdresser n : someone who cuts or beautifies hair [syn: {hairstylist}, {stylist}, {styler}]
